title: What Did Someone Do That Completely Turned You Off?
description:
Yesterday we were talking about a man who kicked a woman to the curb over a straw. Yes, what she did with two straws told him everything he needed to know about her.
So today, we're asking you! What was someone thing that someone did on a date that completely turned you off?
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
